title: About Me
content:
I am a builder, a leader, an achiever, and a team player. I love building software products that elevate every-day experiences and help people effortlessly accomplish their goals.

My product background spans software platforms in market research and consumer insights tech (subscription-based SaaS consumer products) to health technology (clinical platforms, internal tooling, enterprise software).
